title: Tasty Charcoal Grilled Chicken Recipe
content:
Delicious and moist grilled chicken which tastes so delicious and it is a fun recipe to try with your friends and family.

The chicken is so flavourful and tastes so juicy. The chicken outside has a nice crust in them from the charcoal and the inside is so juicy. This tastes amazing with some mayonnaise or garlic sauce.

 

Charcoal Grilled Chicken Recipe

Prep time: 15 mins

Cook time: 40 mins

Total time: 55 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 4 servings

 

Ingredients

Chicken 1 whole chicken cut into 10 pieces

Onion - 1 large chopped roughly

Garlic - 10 cloves

Chilli powder -1 tablespoon

Pepper Powder -1 tablespoon

Cumin powder - 1 tablespoon

Red Chilli flakes - 2 tablespoons

Sugar - 1 tablespoon

Salt to taste

Lemon Juice or Vinegar - ¼ cup

Oil - ¼ cup

Oregano - 1 tablespoon

Cayenne pepper powder - 1 teaspoon

 

Instructions

Take all ingredients in a blender except oil and chicken.

Grind to a smooth paste.

Take it in a large bowl, add oil and mix well.

Put the chicken in the marinade and mix well.

Leave to marinate for at least 4 to 6 hours. overnight is best.

Cook on a charcoal grill till done.

Serve it.

recommendations.content:

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Cakes Recipe
recommendations.content:
Chicken cakes that taste so delicious with ketchup or mayo. This chicken cake is so easy to make and taste fantastic.
These delicious chicken cakes is super easy to make and taste amazing. You can make this in a few minutes and kids will love this for sure.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
